title: To an Inconstant One - paraphrase of lines 11-12

content.question: Which of the following best paraphrases lines 11-12 ?

choices.label: If you had remained true to yourself, I might perhaps still be yours.
If you had not changed, I might not have changed either.
If you had stayed with me, I might have remained loyal to you.
If you had not left, I might have possibly asked for your hand in marriage.

content.answer: If you had remained true to yourself, I might perhaps still be yours.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
